targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_active") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'salon' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("usage_active") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'mano' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("usage_active") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'lifo' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("usage_active") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'metal' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("usage_active") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'kubi0' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("usage_active") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'ryzen' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'salon') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'mano') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'lifo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'metal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'kubi0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'ryzen') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("temp") FROM "temp" WHERE ("host" = 'salon') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("value")/1000 as value FROM "cpu_temp" WHERE ("host" = 'mano') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("value")/1000 as value FROM "cpu_temp" WHERE ("host" = 'lifo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("value")/1000 as value FROM "cpu_temp" WHERE ("host" = 'metal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("value")/1000 as value FROM "cpu_temp" WHERE ("host" = 'kubi0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT "temperature" FROM "servers weather" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "temperature" FROM "livingroom tag" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "power" FROM "pc socket" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "power" FROM "shelly routers servers" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("query_time_ms") FROM "dns_query" WHERE ("host" = 'salon') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("query_time_ms") FROM "dns_query" WHERE ("host" = 'mano') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("query_time_ms") FROM "dns_query" WHERE ("host" = 'lifo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'lifo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'metal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'kubi0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
